fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: We are concerned with all initiatives that concern international trade and sustainability.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Trade Contact Group#E02134#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2134#Member#C#Group of Experts on EU Trade Agreements #E03556#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3556#Member#C
goals__remit: We are a the leading business association of global commerce that enables organisations to enhance human prosperity, use natural resources responsibly and drive open trade globally.  We call this Trade with Purpose.
